Player History
Signed as a free agent by New York (M) on 2/4/1986 to a 2-year deal worth $300,000 per year...
Traded from New York (M) to Chicago on 8/1/1988 (Going to NYM: P Jamie Moyer. Going to CHC: P Randy Myers, SS Jose Hernandez)...
Had first career hit on 4/3/1990, off Kevin Tapani (SD)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/15/1990, off Sid Fernandez (NYM)...
Won World Series with Chicago in 1992...
